word_mean: 同位素：原子序数(核质子数)相等而原子量(核中子数)不同的元素
中子数不同的同一种元素的一种原子形式，包括稳定同位素和放射性同位素。

sentence.Network_en: Lasers promise to change this by making isotope separation easier, and cheaper.
sentence.Network_cn: 激光可以改变这种局面,从而使同位素分离变得比较容易 、 比较廉价一些.

sentence.Network_en: This indium isotope was created at the same time as the earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种铟同位素与地球产生在同一时代.

sentence.Network_en: The isotope ratio is directly used for comparing oils or gases.
sentence.Network_cn: 同位素比率直接用于比较各种石油或天然气.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1913: coined by F. Soddy, from iso- 'equal' + Greek topos 'place' (because the isotopes occupy the same place in the periodic table of elements)

entry.def: Isotopes are atoms that have the same number of protons and electrons but different numbers of neutrons and therefore have different physical properties.

means.word_mean: 1. one of two or more atoms with the same atomic number but with different numbers of neutrons

auth_sentence.content: Her isotope levels showed her to have been local.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her isotope levels showed her to have been local.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her isotope levels showed her to have been local.

auth_sentence.content: There is also an very old lead-isotope signature.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is also an very old lead-isotope signature.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is also an very old lead-isotope signature.

auth_sentence.content: This half-life differs dramatically from isotope to isotope.

stems_affixes.word_buile: iso等,同+gen产生+y→共同产生→同源
iso等,同+tope放→放在等同地位→同位素

sentences.en: Tritium is one of the mildest radioactive isotopes.
sentences.cn: 氚是最和缓的放射性同位素之一。
